turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was wanting to order two medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both of them with pepperoni and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I'd like both of those thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 thin crust medium pizzas, with pepperoni and cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $40, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be it. Thank you.
